{"id":979884411,"question_id":2847,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1687769155,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/979884411/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Maximum Number of String Pairs","memory":"41 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumNumberOfStringPairs(String[] words) {\n        int len = words.length;\n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n                \n                if(isRev(words[i], words[j]))\n                    cnt++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return cnt;\n    }\n    \n    private boolean isRev(String a, String b){\n        \n        if(a.length()!=b.length())\n            return false;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<a.length(); i++){\n            \n            if(a.charAt(i)!=b.charAt(b.length()-1-i))\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-maximum-number-of-string-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
